title: Ticket #4743: dagman fails to do a condor_rm of a held job on windows
description: Once the job_dagman_abort-B test was adapted to run on windows, the test still fails. The final status in the status file does not the expected of aborted but instead removed. dagman is failing to complete a condor_rm of the held job.
remarks:
2014-Dec-02 14:39:41 by bt:
This is not a defect. It was something about my laptop set up. the job_dagman_abort-B test is running fine now on windows in the batlab. (bt)
